description: Represents a stored analysis within a collaboration

DefaultValue.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 250  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 100  
Pattern: [0-9a-zA-Z_]+  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SMALLINT | INTEGER | BIGINT | DECIMAL | REAL | DOUBLE_PRECISION | BOOLEAN | CHAR | VARCHAR | DATE | TIMESTAMP | TIMESTAMPTZ | TIME | TIMETZ | VARBYTE  
Update requires: No interruption

AnalysisParameter.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

TableName.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_](([a-zA-Z0-9_ ]+-)*([a-zA-Z0-9_ ]+))?$  
Update requires: No interruption

ReferencedTables.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AnalysisSchema.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Text.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 15000  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms analysis template.
Tags.markdownDescription:
An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this cleanrooms analysis template.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

AnalysisParameters.description: The member who can query can provide this placeholder for a literal data value in an analysis template

The member who can query can provide this placeholder for a literal data value in an analysis template

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

Description.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 255  
Pattern: ^[\u0020-\uD7FF\uE000-\uFFFD\uD800\uDBFF-\uDC00\uDFFF\t\r\n]*$  
Update requires: No interruption

MembershipIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 36  
Maximum Length: 36  
Pattern: [0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}  
Update requires: Replacement

Name.markdownDescription:

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^[a-zA-Z0-9_](([a-zA-Z0-9_ ]+-)*([a-zA-Z0-9_ ]+))?$  
Update requires: Replacement

---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: SQL  
Update requires: Replacement
